Journal.Title: The British journal of general practice : the journal of the Royal College of General Practitioners

Article.ArticleTitle: Postural tachycardia syndrome and long COVID: an update.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Chair and Trustee, PoTS UK; Visiting Professor, Birmingham City University, Birmingham.
